headline: Block, Inc. Surpasses $200 Billion in Credit Provided to Customers, Continuing to Address Global Lending Gaps
summary: DISTRIBUTED-WORK-MODEL/OAKLAND, Calif., January 20, 2026--Block, Inc. (NYSE: XYZ) today announced it has provided access to more than $200 billion to customers in global lending across its portfolio of credit products, including Cash App Borrow, Afterpay, and Square Loans.1 Through this work, Block is proving that with the right technology, inclusive lending and responsible risk management aren't opposing forces; rather, they're the foundation of sustainable credit for the next generation. This

headline: Afterpay tallies BNPL repayments
summary: Most Afterpay customers have repaid their Black Friday and Cyber Monday purchases, the company said, pushing back on consumer “debt spiral” concerns.

content.title: Afterpay tallies BNPL repayments
content.summary: Most Afterpay customers have repaid their Black Friday and Cyber Monday purchases, the company said, pushing back on consumer “debt spiral” concerns.

thumbnail.caption: People carry bags during Black Friday shopping at American Dream Mall on November 28, 2025 in East Rutherford, New Jersey.
